name: Shey Boetger
text: I love the employees and managers here. I tried applying before COVID and at that time everyone knew me. There garlic bread is amazing! They are always so friendly and welcoming and I am glad for that.

name: Country M
text: We have our order on Autopilot... Super nice people who always take good care of our hot and fresh order weekly. Thank you

name: Debbie
text: Excellent pizza, excellent curbside pickup, excellent experience!! Very impressed with Amber's exceptional customer service!! Thank you!

name: Paul Maldonado
text: I love this restaurant a lot. there is a great ambiance. The food is superb. the service is efficient and the waiters are very professional. The pay is honest. deeply recommend.

name: Emily Wates
text: I called and put in an order for a pizza last night. I was told it would be 65 minutes. An hour and a half later I still had not received my pizza so I called to check on the order. The girl who originally took my order said she remembered …More

name: John Womack
text: The food is regularly well prepared and delicious, staff members gives fantastic service. I love how clean it is and character. I highly recommend this spot.

name: Hanna Decker
text: I order from this pizza hut at least once a week. I love it

name: Sally Willits
text: Pizza is ok but the chicken wings are good .

name: Emma Rae Langdon
text:
Pros: great on timing, order is correct, service was friendly.
Cons: extra marinara I paid for is only half-filled, food was not very warm (which is odd given the store is 1 mile away), and the pizza’s barely got marinara …More

name: James Phillips
text: Fast friendly service and great food served by efficient and courteous staff.

name: nate dz
text: Fast delivery but not good about addressing customer issues

name: Kilee Dinneweth
text: This Pizza Hut is the best of all Pizza huts. Always on time with orders. Handles my big families orders well, and is nice all while doing it. It is a very cute little store. I love how they decorate for halloween, christmas, etc. Makes it …More

name: Diana Lee
text: I have tried to call them over 20 times the 3 times I have ordered from here, and they haven’t answered once. They said it would be a 40 minute wait, but I ended up waiting over and hour and a half. By the time they got my food here it was cold. I had to reheat it in the microwave.

name: Kris Eveland
text: Great pizza at a great price.   The service can be a bit spotty though.

name: David Ruble
text: Fast and low cost. Standard hut experience.

name: MIKE B.
text: Mouse droppings in the pizza crust. Mmmmmmmmm. Glad they left the cheese alone. My ladt P. H. PIZZA FROM ELDRIDGE.

name: Heather Clark
text: Called and ordered a pizza on a Friday night and we're told it would be a 90 minute wait, which we were OK with! After an hour, received a call that they ran out of dough and it would be a 3 hour wait. We cancelled our order but they …More

name: Janet Haycraft
text: Pizza Hut should better equip their staff to promotions.  Not going into great detail, except for the fact that I contacted their main office with the problem getting no response.  Faithfully bought pizza there one to two times a week, …More

name: Zero Cortical Inhibition
text: The nice man offered to get me chicken mcmuggets, he said "youve got the wrong store but since they close soon i can go get you some" thanks Chris!

name: Nancy Dugan
text: Five stars based completely on friendliness of staff and fast, efficient service! They are great :)

name: Bri Williams
text: Management is very helpful and workers seem friendly and fast. Great improvement.

name: Josh Baker
text: One star for the one in every five times I order from here and they get my order correct and on time.

name: Dan Allison
text: The problem with Pizza Hut in Eldridge is they CANNOT get an order right to save there life. They had to come back to our house three times before we finally got what we actually ordered. No thanks. I'll just run up to Caseys

name: Mark Keith
text: Rude when I called, was hung up on. Will never try them again.

name: Linda Jenkins
text: Always hot and fresh pasta.. very friendly staff

name: Brian Porter
text: Good fast pizza. Friendly staff

name: Alex F
text: Service is great

name: Adam Riggs
text: The new manager is really making changes. Store is much cleaner than before and service gets better every week.

name: susanne
text: Horrible

name: Evan Beechamp
text: Great customer service

name: Stephen Pedersen
text: Pizza arrived cold driver couldn't find building entrance even though he called and I gave him instructions,  also driver for hot paper work to sign won't be calling here any time soon.

name: Fix or Fab
text: #awesome #lovepizzahut #stuffedcrustFTW
